name: dungeon-crawler-game
description: This project is a lightweight browser-based dungeon crawler. It lets players explore levels, battle enemies and gather loot directly in the browser.

scripts.test: node tests/mercenaryFollow.test.js && node tests/skillbook.test.js && node tests/mana.test.js && node tests/homingProjectile.test.js && node tests/prefixSuffix.test.js && node tests/mercenarySkill.test.js && node tests/traits.test.js && node tests/traitEffects.test.js
